message: I don't recognize you. You're not from Remgard, are you?

replies.text: No, I am from a small settlement called Crossglen, and I am looking for my brother Andor.

message: Ok then. Good luck with that.
Don't get in my way, I'm trying to walk here, don't you see?

replies.text: No, you get out of *my* way!

message: Hah! *snort*
Have you seen my ring? I dropped it among these trees, I am sure. That was a pretty ring.
Good day.
Excuse me, I have no time to talk.
You are not from around here, are you? If you ever need a place to stay, visit the tavern. I hear that Kendelow has a room available for rent.
I have heard strange noises from across the water of lake Laeroth. I wonder what lurks on the shores of the other side.
Hello.
Woof! *pant* *pant*
No, get away! They can't find me here. Don't give away my good hiding spot!
Hey, get out of here! This is my house!
(You see Larni holding his forehead.) Hey, *cough* get out of here! This is .. *cough* .. my house!
So much work to do. I sure hope we will have some rain soon.
Welcome to my shop. Would you like to see what I have available?

replies.text: Yes, please show me what you have.

message: (Arnal clears his throat)
Welcome to .. *cough* .. my shop. Would you like .. *cough* .. to see what I have available?

replies.text: Yes, please show me what you have.
Get away from me, I don't want to catch whatever it is you are infected with!

message: I don't know what .. *cough* .. happened. I started getting dizzy and nauseous. Now this cough is really irritating. It must have been something I ate. *cough*
May you forever walk with the Shadow, my child.

replies.text: Do you have anything to trade?
What do you do around here?

message: I provide .. guidance to those that seek it. The Shadow guides us. It keeps us safe and comforts us when we sleep.
Lately, it seems Remgard has been in dire need of the comfort that the Shadow provides.

replies.text: Do you have anything to trade?

message: The Shadow follows us wherever we go. Go with the Shadow my child.
I've got my eye on you. Don't do anything stupid.
Don't even think about it.
*burp* Ha ha! I never thought she would! Or was it the other way around? I can't remember.
*burp* This is the best place in all of the northern lands!
Oh, hello there. *burp* Kid, I tell you, don't go looking for trouble even if you think you can handle it.
I did once, and ended up in those horrid caverns of Mount Galmore.
That place twists your mind. I tell you, don't go there, even if you think you do!
*burp* What was that? Were you saying something?
Oh, hello. I can't talk right now, must finish planting these crops.
I hope the lands will be good to us this season.
(Chael gives you a blank stare)
Chael chop wood. Wood make Chael happy.
Guards! Someone has broken into my room and is trying to rob me!

replies.text: That's right. Hand over all your belongings and you may still live.

message: Help! Guards!
Hey, this is my house. Get out of here before I call the guards!
